column1: Little Goat Diner////Was expecting a lot considering the tie to Girl & the Goat. The rooftop was beautiful and enjoyable. However
column2: the food overall was really disappointing. Service was good
column3: but on the slower side. We waited over 2 hours for a table
column5: in the end it wasn't worth it. I think there are a lot of other restaurants in the area (au cheval
column6: the girl & the goat main restaurant
column7: etc) that would've been much more worth it!
